tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Selva Kumar's expertise in root canal treatment is truly commendable. My mother was treated by him, and we were thoroughly impressed by the professionalism and care he exhibited throughout the procedure. His attention to detail and patient comfort made what could have been a stressful experience, a smooth and painless one. We are grateful for his exceptional service and would highly recommend him to anyone in need of dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Doctor was so friendly and the way of approach to the patients is also good. The treatment did by the doctor went good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor was freindly and took care of the treatment in a structured way. He also explained the course of treatment well in advance and reasonable in his charges

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: denture issue for my grandfather was not resolved. we were forced to visit them ************* and the end product was a complete problematic one. The treatement was only improved on our last sitting but prior to that we had faced several unwanted disturbances. its unworthy of money and time.
reply_text:
Sir I am extremely sorry for your problem.
Dentures will have some issue initially and It is not a single stage procedure. 
It might require multiple visits.
Unless its necessary  we won't ask the patient  to come unnecessarily 
If any problem kindly report to the owner of the clinic.
If u can give ur name and number I will chk my records and revert back to u.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
He is really doing good job and his treatment for my daughter is very helpful and my baby is only 3and half yr old he gave nice treatment to my baby 
Main thing is now in this situation I request and ask him to give treatment fr my baby he helped me thanks Doctor Sivakumar.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr Selva Kumar is an experienced and good dentist. I met him 15yrs back for my dental issues.He is very kind.  He treats patients gently. He explaines the problem clearly. Now he became our family doctor. He handled my 5yrs son softly during tooth extraction.
reply_text: WE THANKS FOR YOUR VALUABLE WORDS ABOUT KUMARAN DENTAL CLINIC....
